amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect Medicaid beneficiaries from benefit cuts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 386 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 3. Record Vote Number: 79.

action.text: Amendment SA 386 proposed by Senator Sanders. (consideration: CR S1744-1748, S1750-1751; text: CR S1744) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect Medicaid beneficiaries from benefit cuts.
